caption:
Table 6: Hyperparameter selection for the Right for the Right Reasons [36] method for all models-
ViT [13], ViT AugReg [45], and DeiT [48]. Hyperapramters vary according to the model.

Table 7: Hyperparameter selection for the GradMask [41] method for all models-ViT [13], ViT 
AugReg [45], and DeiT [48].

Table 8: Results using 3 random seeds. The table presents the average and standard deviation of the 
top-1 accuracy per dataset.

Table 9: Results using 3 random seeds. The table presents the average and standard deviation of the 
top-5 accuracy per dataset.

Table 10: Robustness evaluation on the classes that were included in the training set of our finetuning 
and classes that were not. The results are presented for the base models of ViT [13], ViT AugReg [45], 
and DeiT [48]. The last row indicates the average change for the training and non-training classes 
across the models for each dataset.
Table 12: Ablation study for our method on the ViT
